programme.title: The Leftovers
programme.desc: Drama set in a small New York community, where the locals are still coming to terms with a global event three years earlier when two per cent of the worlds population mysteriously disappeared. Police chief Kevin Garvey finds himself at the centre of the problems, having to deal with escalating conflict in the town while also tackling his daughters rebellious streak. In the first episode, the townsfolk discuss whether to hold a tribute to the departed, while the appearance of a silent, white-clad cult causes great concern. As tension escalates, the lives of Laurie - an unexpected member of the Guilty Remnant - and Meg, a recently engaged woman, converge. Justin Theroux, Amy Brenneman, Christopher Eccleston and Liv Tyler star

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Lisa bids to save the reputation of Springfields first female inventor, while Marge and Homer begin to suspect that Bart might be a sociopath

programme.title: Hawaii Five-0
programme.desc: Danno scrambles to find the $18.5million he needs to save his brothers life. With the deadline inching closer, Chin puts his career on the line to help his colleague and friend. Meanwhile, a Detroit hitman is targeted by a colleague. Action drama, starring Scott Caan, Daniel Dae Kim and Alex OLoughlin

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: In a parody of Richard Linklaters film Boyhood, this episode is a coming-of-age story chronicling Barts life from the age of six to him becoming a fully accomplished young man. His tense relationship with Homer is catalogued, as is the fact that he is overshadowed by the more successful Lisa at every turn. These factors shape his personality and his future more than he realises

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Marge posts a humorous photo online of Homer eating an ice-cream outside the nuclear plant, prompting Mr Burns to fire him, while a female coder decides to make Lisa her protegee. With the guest voices of Stephen Merchant and Kaitlin Olson

programme.title: The Office (US)
programme.desc: Michael and Dwight try to infiltrate a successful family-run paper company in a bid to steal their client list, but the experience causes Michael to have a change of heart

programme.title: The Office (US)
programme.desc: Part one of two. Dwights surprise fire-safety drill results in Stanley having a heart attack, so Michael decides the staff needs help with stress relief

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Bart and Lisa frighten their family with blood-curdling tales of terror, including a spine-tingling version of Edgar Allan Poes The Raven. With the guest voice of James Earl Jones

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: In the long-running animations 26th Halloween special, Sideshow Bob finally kills Bart, only to reanimate him. Homer wakes up with short-term memory loss, and Lisa, Bart, and Milhouse get superpowers from radiation

programme.title: David Attenboroughs Galapagos
programme.desc: The broadcaster concludes his exploration of the archipelago with a look at how, despite their proximity, no two of the 19 islands are the same. He also uncovers evidence that evolution on Galapagos is occurring faster than Charles Darwin could ever have imagined, and encounters Lonesome George, the last remaining giant Pinta Island tortoise, who died just a few weeks after filming in June 2012

programme.title: Never Mind the Buzzcocks
programme.sub-title: Pepsi and Shirlie/ Martin Fry/Debbie Gibson/Judi Love

Horror, starring Ethan Hawke and Juliet Rylance

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Sanjays son turns the Kwik-E-Mart into a health-food store against Apus insistence on tradition. Bart renounces his devotion to pranks after his mischief has unforeseen consequences, but is called upon to return to his wicked ways and take down the new enterprise

programme.title: Hawaii Five-0
programme.desc: Emotions run high when McGarrett meets an acquaintance of his father at his graveside, prompting him to reopen the unsolved case the old man was working on just before his death. Alex OLoughlin and Mirrah Foulkes star

programme.title: Hawaii Five-0
programme.desc: Wo Fat kidnaps McGarrett to get answers about his father, and when he drugs his captive in the hope of getting at the truth, the detective begins hallucinating about the past - a different past with his own dad. One hundredth episode of the crime drama, starring Alex OLoughlin and Mark Dacascos, with guest appearances from William Sadler and Bush singer Gavin Rossdale

programme.title: S.W.A.T.
programme.desc: Hondo and company race against the clock to find two men bent on killing millions in Los Angeles. Starring Shemar Moore

programme.desc: As Pride directs the team to link Sasha to the recent attacks in New Orleans, he must help Connor come to terms with who his mother really is. Carter and Tammy search for a stolen military dog, while Pride and Rita make an important decision about their wedding

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Bart and Lisa get to know a homeless folk singer named Hettie, after Bart accidentally loses the shopping trolley containing her possessions and invites her to stay in his bedroom wardrobe. Meanwhile, Homers attempt at DIY traps the cat in the walls of the house, so he launches a rescue bid

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Lisa is inspired to become a veterinarian and begins an internship at the local vets surgery, but she learns a tough lesson when the schools neglected hamster dies. Marge gets a job as a crime-scene cleaner, but is traumatised by the gory sights. Michael York guest stars

programme.title: The Office (US)
programme.desc: Part two of two. Michael stages a no-holds-barred roast of himself, while Andy, Pam and Jim watch an unlicensed movie with Jack Black, Jessica Alba, and Cloris Leachman

programme.title: The Office (US)
programme.desc: Part one of two. Michael and Pam go to Nashua to get closure from Holly, while Dwight and Jim do their best to make up for not remembering Kellys birthday

programme.title: The Simpsons

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Dracula, the Wolf Man, the Mummy and Frankensteins monster gatecrash a Halloween party at 742 Evergreen Terrace. Bart and Lisa plot revenge on their teachers in a Hitchcock-inspired short story, but end up turning on each another

Part one of a two-part Horror based on the Stephen King novel, starring Bill Skarsgard, Jaeden Lieberher and Sophia Lillis

programme.title: An Idiot Abroad
programme.desc: The odd couples trip continues via India, one of Karl Pilkingtons least favourite destinations from his previous travels. To get him in the right frame of mind, his companion Warwick Davis introduces him to laughing yoga, before they land roles in a Bollywood movie, watch the sun set over the River Ganges and clown around at the circus, where Karl experiences his first real holiday highlight when he meets conjoined twins

programme.title: Fíorsceal
programme.desc: Micro and nanoplastics are everywhere - scientists have even found some of them lodged in human organs, from the liver to the lungs, the intestines, to the placenta. Scientists are exploring new leads to understand the effects of micro-plastics on human health. Disruption of the microbiota, saturation of the immune system, inflammation of the lungs and intestines, DNA damage and a risk factor for cancer. This documentary seeks to better understand how plastics colonise human bodies and how they could alter them

programme.title: Special Ops: To Catch a Criminal
programme.desc: The return of the documentary series that follows the investigations of specialist units within UK police forces created to crack the toughest of cases, from cyber heists, romance fraud and people trafficking to drug rings and murder. With access to some of Britain’s most talented detectives, the series explores the investigations, methods and evidence that has put some of the UK’s most dangerous criminals behind bars. Each episode features evidential police footage as they take on criminals and hunt for clues to solve the cases. The series offers a first-hand experience of the work of the elite units on the front line while witnessing their bravery, skill and compassion amid tragedy and loss. The series also discovers how detectives operate in the interview room, how forensics bring a case into focus, and how expert CCTV and digital analysis create timelines and evidence to catch a criminal, and the impact these crimes have on the communities they serve. The suspicious demise of a woman at the cult-like Wiltshire retreat of a self-proclaimed healer sparks a global investigation and a link to a death in Australia

programme.title: Casualty
programme.sub-title: The Mess Were In - Part One
programme.desc: Part one of two. Maggies career hangs in the balance as the court case begins, with Marilyn forcing Simon and Zoe to lie under oath - but Charlie spots a weakness in their case. Big Mac impresses Kelsey with a surprising skill, and Tobys mother visits the department with a journalist in tow

programme.title: The Bill
programme.desc: PC Stamp is involved in a serious accident in which he kills a pedestrian while reversing an area car down a one-way street. The incident causes a rift between his fellow coppers - who all have opinions on who was to blame - and jeopardises Stamps future at Sun Hill. Graham Cole stars as the beleaguered copper

programme.title: Classic EastEnders
programme.desc: Ronnie and Roxy get mixed up in Peggys electioneering, but not how anyone planned. And while Billy fails to keep his secrets locked away, Danielles attention turns to Amy

programme.desc: A worrying event back home involving his wife forces Michael Stubbs to contemplate his priorities. Starring Robson Green and Rob Spendlove

programme.title: Last of the Summer Wine
programme.sub-title: How Not to Cry at Weddings

programme.title: Last of the Summer Wine

programme.title: A Remarkable Place to Die

programme.title: New Tricks
programme.desc: A police informant resurfaces after 17 years on the run, and claims to have details implicating a crook-turned-celebrity in an unsolved armed robbery. programme.title: Spooks
programme.desc: Harry faces deportation to America, so he agrees to go quietly on the condition that the signing of the alliance between the UK and Russia be brought forward. But when Elena confides in Ruth that she has information about an imminent attack on the UK, Section D have no choice but to break their boss out of CIA custody. programme.title: DIY SOS
programme.desc: Nick Knowles and the team head to Chesterfield, Derbyshire, to help Lisa and Richard Watson. With an expanding family and a young daughter who requires 24-hour care, builder Richard has not been able to complete an extension he started, but along with support from the building trade and local community, the team hopes to lift the strain on the family

programme.title: DIY SOS
programme.desc: Nick Knowles and the team travel to a village in Conwy, north Wales, to help a widower finish building his home. Since the death of his wife and being diagnosed with cancer, David Williams has been unable to work on the property and lives in a caravan with his young daughter Erica - so the crew helps to make the house habitable with the support of the local community and traders

programme.title: DIY SOS
programme.desc: Nick Knowles helps adapt a house in Enfield, north London, for Eric Rivers, who is terminally ill with motor neurone disease. He, his wife Davina and three daughters require their terraced property to be altered to meet his needs and provide them with additional room, so friends, neighbours and local tradespeople rally round to complete the construction work in just nine days

programme.title: MasterChef Australia
programme.desc: In the Time Auction challenge, each finalist bids on the ingredients they want to cook with. The higher they bid, the less time theyll have to cook

programme.title: Inside the Ambulance
programme.desc: The emergency medical team comes to the aid of a student with a life-threatening condition, and also helps a suicidal patient with violent tendencies

programme.title: One Born Every Minute
programme.desc: Cameras follow the drama at Liverpool Womens Hospital, where Jodie, 19, found out that she was pregnant after she had a fling with Stephen, 22. Hes determined to see his parental responsibilities through, including being at her bedside during a long labour. Also featured is 44-year-old Derroll, who met his wife Maria online. Shes a mother of four and wants him to experience fatherhood for himself, but its not without its challenges

programme.title: One Born Every Minute
programme.desc: It took 30-year-old Louise and her husband Andy six years to conceive. Now theyre looking forward to meeting their baby and showing it off to their worried family and health care assistant Olwen. Cameras also follow Sammy, 23, who is about to have her third child. An undiagnosed condition drove a wedge between Sammy and her mum, when her bad behaviour was put down to teenage hormones, until a long-awaited diagnosis of endometriosis when she was 19 enabled them to build bridges

programme.title: Bradford on Duty
programme.desc: With access to Bradfords district nurses, police and council workers, this series follows the people dedicated to making their city a better place - from the frontline workers patrolling the streets all the way up to the leaders making strategic decisions in the City Hall

programme.title: Inside the Ambulance
programme.desc: Janine and Adam assist a woman who is threatening to jump out of a first-floor window, and husband and wife team Ann and Kevin are called out to help Anns sick Dad

programme.title: Interior Design Masters with Alan Carr
programme.desc: The three semi-finalists upgrade lakeside holiday lodges in the heart of the Cotswolds, each of which includes an open-plan kitchen, living and dining space and an outside terrace. The buildings are decidedly beige, giving the designers a blank canvas to work on - and knowing they are only one week away from the final they really go to town, with schemes ranging from bold primary colours inspired by a classic 1980s movie to a sophisticated monochrome look. Michelle Ogundehin judges their efforts with help from designer Abigail Ahern

programme.title: Amanda and Alans Italian Job
programme.desc: Amanda Holden and Alan Carr set about renovating the bathrooms. Amanda is unconvinced about Alans bidet and Alan tries to veto Amandas disco ball installation - but neither will back down on their vision. In Alans quest to stay true to Sicilian culture, he treats Amanda to a visit to Marsalas salt pans for a unique spa experience. Amandas dreams of a roll-top bath come crashing down as Alan sets her the task of recycling the apartments existing one, but karma kicks in as his DIY skills are pushed to the limit with a masterclass in floor tiling

programme.title: Nick Knowles Big House Clearout
programme.desc: The presenter is in Brighton, helping Lauren and Mark de-clutter their two-bed home, while his team of trusty builders give it a value-for-money makeover. The house is packed to the rafters with everything from vintage furniture to family heirlooms, ceramics, clothing, shoes, and bags. Thirteen years worth of memories are hard to part with and after a slow first day, Nick is forced to stage a big intervention

programme.title: Tipping Point

programme.title: DIY SOS
programme.desc: Nick Knowles helps Sue Roberts, who was left with a run-down cottage near Dumfries, when her partner Barry died of a heart attack on Christmas Day 2003. She found herself suffering from depression with two children to look after, so Nick enlists a team of helpers to fix up the property and assist the family with getting their lives back on track

programme.title: DIY SOS
programme.desc: In the heart of the West Midlands, Nick Knowles and local volunteers help a Dudley family whose three children have a genetic learning disorder. The Whitehouses tried to add an extension to their house, but after living in a building site for a year it had become too much. The build has to be completed in just nine days, and plummeting sub-zero temperatures make the task even more daunting

programme.title: DIY SOS
programme.desc: Nick Knowles heads to Duxford in Cambridgeshire, where he enlists the help of local tradespeople to assist Paul and Sarah Behan. The couple had started on an extension to their small bungalow when the project had to be abandoned due to their son Joshua being diagnosed with a rare and aggressive form of liver cancer. The team puts in an impressive effort, but with only nine days to finish the job the challenge is extensive

programme.title: MasterChef Australia
programme.desc: Its time for the judges and contestants to swap places, as Andy, Poh and Jean-Christophe don their aprons, while the semi-finalists take their places on the judging panel

programme.title: The Secret World of Posh Pets
programme.desc: Janey, the owner of two very large pot-bellied pigs, visits the countrys leading micro pig breeder to learn more about the miniature breed and see what animals are available. Plus, animal behaviourist Emma Dale travels to Oxshott, Surrey, where glamorous mother-of-two Joanna has two rather spoilt rescue beagles that have an unfortunate habit of fouling her kitchen floor. Cameras also follow an ultra-pampered Chelsea cockapoo as it heads for a two-week canine detox at the countrys most exclusive dog hotel

programme.title: The Secret World of Posh Pets
programme.desc: In Warwickshire, Emma designs a half-acre rabbit wonderland with 120 metres of tunnels, a tree house, a maze and a bunny bar for refreshment on hot days. With a ?4,000 budget and only a month to complete its construction, has she bitten off more than she can chew? In west London, designer Nina Naustdals love of her seven Chihuahuas inspires her to create a matching range for dogs, while in the North East internationally respected Great Dane breeder Gary takes prize bitch Scarlet to Crufts, hoping to triumph prior to retiring to become a judge

programme.title: One Born Every Minute
programme.desc: Cameras focus on Christians, a Venezuelan mother-to-be and her Lithuanian husband Karolis as they adjust to a new life in Liverpool. Theres also a look at musicians Lucy and James. She has suffered from anorexia, bulimia and depression, so eating during her pregnancy has been a challenge. Can becoming a mother give her a new perspective and help her deal with those issues?

programme.title: Pete Wicks: For Dogs Sake
programme.sub-title: Terri, Esme and the Chi Family
programme.desc: Pete meets Lurcher Terri, whos terrified of the world and must learn to trust again, and helps settle a family of chihuahuas given up by their heartbroken owner

programme.title: Bradford on Duty
programme.desc: PCSO Tom and his new mentee Wojciech are called to dismantle a lucrative cannabis farm, which is taking over an abandoned mill in the centre of Bradford. West Yorkshire Police deal with a man who has been harassing passengers on a bus, while just around the corner an altercation with a different male turns violent, and he ends up being arrested for attacking an emergency worker

programme.title: Inside the Ambulance
programme.desc: In Dudley, a man collapses while playing bingo two days before his wedding, while in Stoke, crews are called to help an elderly man who has had an unexplained fall.

programme.title: Interior Design Masters with Alan Carr
programme.desc: The two finalists go head to head, each taking on the redesign of a trendy bar in Londons vibrant Soho district. They have three days to make over the ground-floor bar and an intimate basement cocktail lounge - and to help, both contestants have a fellow team-mate, plus a team of trades. One designer goes all-out, relocating the bar to the other side of the room - but the more they rip out, the more it becomes a demolition zone. Down the road, there is indecision and angst as the other finalist realises just how much is at stake. Who will win the career-defining contract to design an upmarket apartment on the Cornish coast?

programme.title: Amanda and Alans Italian Job
programme.desc: Alan takes charge designing the first bedroom, but doubt soon sets in as Amanda and Scott struggle to get on board with his artistic vision. To nail his rustic chic look, Alan visits interior designer Marie at her 300-year-old palazzo and ropes in Amanda to help source vintage gems at Palermos famous flea market. Later, Amanda surprises Alan with a birthday boat trip along Sicilys stunning Zingaro coast

programme.title: Great American Railroad Journeys
programme.desc: Michael Portillo continues to explore Alaska, from the remote former goldrush settlement of Talkeetna to the railwayless state capital, Juneau. Along the way, he helps a homesteader fell a tree to clear land for a log cabin, discovers how 100 years ago photographers captured the beauty of the Alaskan landscape and meets scientists studying the Northern Lights

programme.title: Great American Railroad Journeys
programme.desc: The next leg of Michael Portillos journey begins in Skagway, Alaska, where he learns about writer Jack London, one of the gold prospectors who hiked to the Klondike 100 years ago. He then crosses into Canada on the White Pass and Yukon railway. Along the way he is invited to shake his tail feathers in a grouse dance, heads for the home of the Vancouver Giants, tries his hand at ice hockey and visits the Canadian Motion Picture Park

programme.title: Great American Railroad Journeys
programme.desc: Michael Portillo explores British Columbia, discovering how two superpowers nearly came to war over a pig and joining the Royal Canadian Navy to firefight on board the frigate HMCS Regina. He also explores the rich British heritage and colonial past of Victoria - the provincial capital of British Columbia - discovers the origins of the Hudsons Bay Company, helps to carve a 36- foot totem pole and learns how to head off a charging bear

programme.title: Great American Railroad Journeys
programme.desc: Michael Portillo boards one of the worlds most famous trains, the Rocky Mountaineer, to cross the backbone of the North American continent from Kamloops to the spa resort of Banff. This magnificent journey takes him to the highest point of the 19th century transcontinental Canadian Pacific Railway line at Kicking Horse Pass, past Lake Louise and inside spiral tunnels blasted through the mountains. Along the way, Michael hears of the harsh and dangerous conditions endured by the Chinese and European labourers who built the railway, and looks back at the historic driving of the Last Spike, which completed the Canadian Pacific Railway in 1885

programme.title: This World
programme.desc: Two years after Cuba announced radical economic reforms, broadcaster Simon Reeve heads to the Caribbean island to look at the effects the liberalisation has had. He meets Cubans whose lives are being transformed - from the owners of fledgling businesses to the newly rich estate agents selling properties valued at up to £750,000 - and asks if this new openness could lead to more political freedom. He also explores whether Cuba will be able to maintain the positive aspects of its long isolation under socialism - such as low crime, high-quality education and one of the best healthcare systems in the world - while embracing a form of capitalism. Part of the This World strand

programme.desc: Brian Dowling and his fashion-forward design team continue their mission to prove to the nation that it is possible achieve a dream renovation at little cost. Changing Rooms meets the Repair Shop with a new sustainable twist, the challenge here is to transform our bland old rooms, furniture and fittings into unique and stunning show stoppers, using only upcycling and sustainable methods. This is the home makeover format for the world we live in today, as two households per week, each with a team consisting of an interior designer and an up-cycling wiz, have just four days and 1,000 euro to renovate and rejuvenate a tired spaces in their home, filling them with home-made, re-used and revamped furnishings. programme.desc: The folk of Aidensfield panic when rumours of an escaped killer are confirmed. Rural drama with David Stockwell

Meanwhile, a fourth member of the boozing group is brought in and has his stomach pumped immediately - but it soon emerges that the illicit hooch has blinded him. Elsewhere, Mr Rose and his surgical team treat a widow with a gangrenous toe at her farmhouse, and student nurse Samantha Beaumont receives a telling-off for laying out operating instruments in an incorrect order. Andy Wear, Michael Starke and Robert Daws star, with a guest appearance by Thelma Barlow

programme.title: Agatha Christies Marple
programme.desc: The sleuth is called to Gossington Hall by her old friend Dolly Bantry (Joanna Lumley) when she finds the corpse of an unknown blonde in the library of her home. It soon transpires that there is no shortage of suspects, including local bad boy Basil Blake (Ben Miller) and Dollys husband Arthur (James Fox), but when the victim is identified as a dancer in line to inherit a fortune, enquiries take a different turn. Crime drama, starring Geraldine McEwan, with Simon Callow, Jack Davenport and Tara Fitzgerald

programme.title: Heartbeat
programme.desc: A priceless Manet painting is stolen from a retired German art dealers home, leaving Miller to suspect Lord Ashfordlys involvement. programme.title: The Darling Buds of May
programme.sub-title: Oh! To Be in England - Part One
programme.desc: Part one of two. Pop busies himself organising a christening while awaiting the birth of his first grandchild - and still finds time to cast a beady eye over the contents of an elderly widows home. Whimsical rural drama, starring David Jason, Pam Ferris, Philip Franks and Catherine Zeta-Jones

programme.title: Judge Rinders Crime Stories
programme.desc: Barrister Robert Rinder examines an incident in 2003 where two girls were left fighting for their lives, having been caught in an exchange of gunfire between two rival gangs. The case had far-reaching implications, putting gun violence in Britains inner cities at the top of the political agenda and changing how the courts protect key witnesses

programme.title: Heartbeat
programme.desc: A priceless Manet painting is stolen from a retired German art dealers home, leaving Miller to suspect Lord Ashfordlys involvement. Peggy tries to convince a pair of visiting bird-watchers that Aidensfields wildlife includes a rare bird of prey, and David tries to wing it as an ornithological expert. programme.title: The Hotel Inspector
programme.desc: Ruth Watson revisits Worlington Hall in the Suffolk countryside to see if owners Joy and Sharon have taken her advice on how to save their failing business. On her first trip, she pinpointed an unwelcoming reception, a messy booking system, a confusing food policy and lack of publicity as the main problems impeding its success

programme.title: Wild Britain
programme.desc: The large number of rivers that criss-cross the UK, providing a rich habitat for wildlife. Solid bones and high oxygen levels enable a young dipper bird to dive underwater for 30 seconds, and Atlantic salmon make the long journey back upriver to their spawning grounds. Meanwhile, otters and beavers are making a remarkable recovery after an absence of centuries

programme.title: Emmerdale
programme.desc: Joe has an accident, creating tensions, while Aaron makes an announcement and Dylan struggles to please everyone

programme.title: The Royal
programme.desc: The hospital staff have an intriguing case on their hands when local tramp Sebastian Fox is found dead. Ken Hopkirk rummages through his belongings and is surprised to find war medals, leading to the discovery that he was a decorated Navy hero. When a relative is traced but refuses to help with funeral arrangements, the Royal team decide to give him a fitting send-off by scattering his ashes at sea. Meanwhile, Jeffrey Goodwin is shocked to discover a farmers cattle herd have contracted a disease which has passed into cheese thats available in the area, and Jill Weatherill, Matron and Sister Brigid encounter a runaway girl. Rural medical drama, starring Michael Starke and Wendy Craig

programme.title: Agatha Christies Marple
programme.desc: A series of scandals makes for an interesting few days in the quiet village of St Mary Mead, and most seem to revolve around a blustering local colonel, whose brusque manner and short temper make him unpopular with his fellow villagers. When he is found dead with a bullet through the head, Miss Marple and the reluctant DI Slack investigate.
